name: Arcade Legends Sega Mega Drive Volume 2
summary: The Arcade Legends Sega Mega Drive Volume II, known as the Arcade Legends Sega Genesis Volume 2 or Play TV Legends Sega Genesis Volume 2 in North America and the Mega Drive Play TV 2 in Japan, is a Sega Mega Drive "console on a chip" designed and manufactured by Sega Toys. In the West it was distributed by Radica.
